1.0.name: wordpress/d5-colorful
1.0.description: COLORFUL is a simple blog theme with colorful background and designed with colorful ancient matters. It is a FREE theme developed from D5 Creation (www.d5creation.com). You can use this theme for your blog.  Left and Footer Sidebar will show your WidGets.
